txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Do not draw too much attention from the Orcs</rgb>
You have drawn too much attention from the Orcs, endangering the women in the cave

'I've been unkind to Ránmald for foolish reasons; I see it now. But we shan't let her be alone now, with her family gone and a little one on the way.

'If ye fix me up with some weapons and basic supplies, I'll teach these others to fight, and we'll defend this cave to the very last. I hope the weapons aren't needed, but... I should like to have 'em, just the same.

'Go to the outskirts of Byre Tor and see what ye can scrounge up. Try not to let any Orcs see yeh -- we don't want them following ye back here.'
You drew too much attention from the Orcs, and compromised the safety of the refugees
'Thank ye, [placeholder]. These will do well until we can move Ránmald safely out with the child.'
Firthwyn, trained in arms, wishes to amass a small store of weapons and supplies so that the women can survive in the cave until the baby and Ránmald are ready to travel.

Weapons and supplies can be found on the outskirts of Byre Tor.

You should collect weapons and supplies from Byre Tor without drawing attention from the Orcs, who might follow you back to the refugees' cave and endanger the women.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Drawing too much attention from the Orcs will fail this quest.</rgb>
Frithwyn is at the cave in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should return to Frithwyn with the supplies.
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not draw too much attention from the Orcs</rgb>
